Loki is an open source tool for fact
verification this python based tool is
designed to automate the process of
verifying factuality its list of
components helps explain how it does
what it does first decomposer which
breaks down extensive texts into
digestible independent claims setting
the stage for detailed analysis second
checkw worthy which assesses each claims
potential significance filtering out
vague or ambiguous statements to focus
on those that truly matter third query
generator which transforms checkw worthy
claims into precise queries ready to
navigate the vast expanse of the
internet in search of Truth fourth
evidence crawler which Ventures into the
digital realm retrieving relevant
evidence that forms the foundation of
informed verification and finally claim
verify which examines the gathered
evidence determining the veracity of
each claim to uphold the Integrity of
information put all that together and
what you have is a python script where
you can run something like python fact
check. py-- modal string-- input Loki is
the god of mischief and Loki will go out
there and verify that for you that is
